activities: Our company, Management Communication Systems, Inc. (dba "In Touch") operates confidential and anonymous hotlines for numerous companies that have operations located in the European Economic Area ("EEA").  We collect certain personal information from the stakeholders of these companies including employees, contractors, agents, vendors and others.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Possible off-line personal data for client organisations
recoursemech: As an independent recourse mechanism for the investigation of unresolved complaints, we intend to make use of the services of the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
